entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 25 March 2023
